title: Redeploy app to production

requirements.text: Deploy the current version of the application to production (live environment) on the Internet Computer.
acceptanceCriteria: The application is successfully deployed and accessible at its production canister URL.
All existing features (Hero, About, Courses, Gallery, Teachers, WhyChooseUs, Contact, Footer, etc.) are functional in the live environment.
The TeachersNotes component remains removed from the live build.

constraints: Do not introduce new features or UI changes â€” this is a redeploy of the current codebase only.
TeachersNotes component must remain absent from the deployed build.
nonGoals: Changing any existing UI design or content.
Modifying backend data models or logic.
